'''Oceanborne''' is [[Beidou]]'s [[Normal Attack]].

==Gameplay Notes==
*{{TalentNote|character=Beidou|talent=Oceanborne|ascension|2|Lightning Storm|enhances Beidou's attacks for 10 seconds after unleashing Tidecaller with its maximum DMG Bonus as follows:}}
**The DMG and Attack SPD of Beidou's Normal and Charged Attacks are increased by 15%.
**The wind-up before Beidou begins Charged Attacks is reduced.

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
*{{TalentNote|constellation|4|Stunning Revenge}}
